releaseNotes:
- Enhancements for TV remote support, Custom Loading/Shimmer, and Player Fixes, and many more...

Team Netra

changelog.text: Redesigned the native player interface to deliver a cleaner, more intuitive, and user-friendly viewing experience.
Added support for deep linking and integrated social sharing functionality.
Introduced gesture-based playback speed controls with haptic feedback for enhanced interaction.
Stabilized Picture-in-Picture behavior on devices running Android 12 and later.
Enhanced the link resolving mechanism by enabling automatic background resolution and providing multiple stream options through the player’s “Source” control.
Enforced correct MIME-type handling to prevent media extractor misselection during playback.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
